pages.name: Getting Started
pages.content:
## Quick Start

> Ely requires Wordpress 5 and above.

1. Download the zip file.
2. Extract it.
2. Login to your Wordpress `Dashboard`. 
3. Click on `Plugins` then click on `Add New`.
4. After that click on `Upload Plugin` then click on `Choose File`.
5. Select the zip file from the Folder ely-all and click on Install Now. ( File called ely-gallery-wordpress.zip )
6. Activate the plugin and enjoy the new Awesome Galleries.

> That's it.

## Create Your First Gallery

1. Login to your Wordpress `dashboard`.
2. Create a new `post/page`.
3. Click on `Add Block` or the `+` button.
4. Search for `Ely Gallery`.
5. Click on the Ely Gallery Icon.

> Congratulation you have just created your first Ely gallery.

![youtube video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X1plX638Plg)

pages.name: Gallery Settings
pages.content:
## Block Settings
### Design

Choose between 4 designs:
1. Justified
2. Grid
3. Fullwidth
4. Masonry

![f060dbdf8c465b92635ed644d8bc38ae](documentation/ely-gallery-wordpress/images/f060dbdf8c465b92635ed644d8bc38ae.png)

### Responsive Settings

Set Columns & Front size by device. This way ensures your gallery to look good on all devices.

> Each column contains one image.

![e6f50abf57e54c8d6cd9548dd284ac35](documentation/ely-gallery-wordpress/images/e6f50abf57e54c8d6cd9548dd284ac35.png)

### Row Height Option ( Justified Design )

If you want to make the images height bigger or smaller change this option.

> This option works only with the `Justified` Design.


![19dca534022405debba5a5b32681bb8f](documentation/ely-gallery-wordpress/images/19dca534022405debba5a5b32681bb8f.png)
